Dear {{doc.first_name}},


Further to the review of your performance during probation period, we are glad to confirm your employment with effect from {{frappe.format_date(doc.custom_probation_end_date)}}.

All the other terms and conditions as detailed in your appointment letter remain unchanged.

We look forward to same dedication in your work and wish you tremendous growth at {{doc.company}}. Please sign the duplicate copy of this letter as a token of acceptance of the same.

With best wishes for the coming year.


Sincerely,
